<MethodEndpoint

></MethodEndpoint>

Fetch Invite Code

<Heading id={"request"} as={"h2"} className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[
    {
      name: "groupJid",
      in: "query",
      required: true,
      schema: { type: "string" },
      description: "Group JID",
    },
  ]}
></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema title={"Body"} body={undefined}></RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{
    "200": {
      description: "Successful response",
      content: {
        "application/json": {

            type: "object",

              data: {
